p: 130 patients were enrolled, 63.8 % were male, the median age - 64 ± 16 (19Ð91), median BMI Ð 27.9 ± 5,9 (18.8Ð49), ICU LOS Ð 15.4 ± 6,1 days, mortality rate of 26.9 % (35). 70 % of patients were admitted for medical reasons, 31.5 % had normal weight, and the remaining patients were either overweight or obese.
